div.p: Due to the current state, we would like to let you know that our DK/K orientation dates have been postponed. We are looking to plan this event in August, prior to school starting.

div.label: Shared Link URL for DK/K Orientation Update

div.p: Due to the Stay Home Stay Safe order, Clawson Public Schools will be conducting the regularly scheduled Board of Education meeting “virtually” on Monday, April 20, 2020 beginning at 7 p.m.
Click Read Full Article for more information and how to access....

div.p: Having trouble with the site content or finding information about our district? Please contact Megan Meisel by email at megan.meisel@clawsonschools.org for assistance with any of our internet delivered content.
